content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there is also a bonus garment schematic included in the pdf the honeycomb mesh crochet top is the perfect crochet top for warm weather wear the openwork crochet mesh stitch pattern and coboo yarn make this versatile design cool enough to wear on hot summer days wear it over a tank top cami or swimsuit pair it with shorts jeans or a skirt get many different looks with just one lightweight crochet top it s even great for fall wear it under a jean jacket for a fun casual vibe **purchase the summer mesh crochet top kit aff ** 2 lion brand has a full kit of the honeycomb mesh crochet top 3 available on their website the crochet kit includes your choice of colors and a digital copy of the crochet pattern **sizing** the pattern is written in women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56 - 58 60 - 62 **instructions included for shortening or lengthening your top easily make a crochet crop top or crochet tunic ** **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand coboo in olive 100 g / 3 5oz / 232 yards / 212 m / 51% cotton / 49% rayon from bamboo other dk weight 3 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic and photo tutorials where needed summer top design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2023 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/honeycomb-crochet-mesh-top/ 2 https //shrsl com/45aq8 3 https //shrsl com/45aq8
